moves.1... Nf6 2. Nf3 g6: All is even at the moment
moves.3. Bf4 Bg7 4. c3 d6: This prevents my knight going to e5 which is where I would like to place it at some point
moves.5. e3 Bg4 6. Nbd2 O-O 7. Qb3 b6 8. Bc4: I decide to put a little pressure on f7
moves.8... Nc6: Black is threatening Na5 so I drop the queen back
moves.11. Bg3 Nde7 12. h3: Now I chase the black bishop
moves.12... Bxf3 13. Nxf3 e5: Mmm, move the king to safety
moves.14. O-O f5: This looks aggressive but weakens blacks kingside
moves.15. Qb3+ Kh8 16. Ng5 Qd7: White will get a rook for a knight
